analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#161-163) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#260-297)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#374-397)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#468-483)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#487-505)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#568-572) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#308-327):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#323-324)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#324-325)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#599-614) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#613)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#535) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#578-580)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#568-572)
	- /unique_contracts/0x81be91c7e74ad0957b4156f782263e7b0b88cf7b.sol#570-571
